member.name: D2D1_COLORMANAGEMENT_ALPHA_MODE
member.summary: Indicates how the Color management effect should interpret alpha data that is contained in the input image.

member.name: D2D1_COLORMANAGEMENT_ALPHA_MODE.D2D1_COLORMANAGEMENT_ALPHA_MODE_PREMULTIPLIED
member.summary: The effect assumes the alpha mode is premultiplied.

member.name: D2D1_COLORMANAGEMENT_ALPHA_MODE.D2D1_COLORMANAGEMENT_ALPHA_MODE_STRAIGHT
member.summary: The effect assumes the alpha mode is straight.
